arguments.value: Only operator can call this function.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only operator can call this function."

nodes.documentation:
@dev Deposit funds into the contract. The caller must send (for ETH) or approve (for ERC20) value equal to or `denomination` of this instance.
@param _commitment the note commitment, which is PedersenHash(nullifier + secret)
nodes.name: deposit

nodes.documentation: @dev this function is defined in a child contract
nodes.name: _processDeposit

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The note has been already spent"

arguments.value: The note has been already spent

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The note has been already spent"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Withdraw a deposit from the contract. `proof` is a zkSNARK proof data, and input is an array of circuit public inputs
`input` array consists of:
- merkle root of all deposits in the contract
- hash of unique deposit nullifier to prevent double spends
- the recipient of funds
- optional fee that goes to the transaction sender (usually a relay)
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation: @dev this function is defined in a child contract
nodes.name: _processWithdraw

nodes.documentation: @dev whether a note is already spent
nodes.name: isSpent

nodes.documentation: @dev whether an array of notes is already spent
nodes.name: isSpentArray

nodes.documentation:
@dev allow operator to update SNARK verification keys. This is needed to update keys after the final trusted setup ceremony is held.
After that operator rights are supposed to be transferred to zero address
nodes.name: updateVerifier
